ModMetaData.name: Dubs Skylights (Glass Patch)
ModMetaData.author: Maaxar
ModMetaData.description:
Patches the skylights in Dubs Skylights mod to use the Glass from the Glass+Lights mod (or the "Just Glass" mod).
Also removes the "Glass Pane" recipe and item from the Dubs Skylights mod
Requires Dubs Skylights and Glass+Lights.
Thanks to BJR1984 for help with 1.1 updates.
